name: gigamesh
description: A home for all your notes.

scripts.build-production: (cd frontend-lib && npm run build-production) && (cd frontend && npm run build-production) && (cd backend && npm run build-production)
scripts.build-development: (cd frontend-lib && npm run build-development) && (cd frontend && npm run build-development) && (cd backend && npm run build-development)
scripts.check: (cd frontend-lib && npm run check) && (cd frontend && npm run check) && (cd backend && npm run check) && prettier --config .prettierrc.js --ignore-path .gitignore --check .
scripts.serve-development: npm run build-development && (cd backend && npm run serve)
scripts.serve-production: npm run build-production && (cd backend && npm run serve)

author: Stephan Boyer
